title: SHA1 mismatch when copying from B2 (Upper/Lowercase)
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you are reporting a bug or asking for a new feature then please use one of the templates here:

    https://github.com/rclone/rclone/issues/new

otherwise fill in the form below.

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone
SHA1 mismatch when copying from B2:
rclone wants SHA1 in uppercase, B2 gives it in lowercase.

#### Output of `rclone version`
rclone v1.51.0
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.13.7

#### Used OS:
Debian 10.3.0

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Backblaze B2

#### The command you were trying to run (eg rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp)
rclone -P copy b2-computer:Backup b2-backup

#### Part of the output of the command
2020-04-24 04:09:54 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 4013 errors and: object corrupted on transfer - SHA1 mismatch (want "3392C5AFDD66FA54488A5A9F22320073F9AEC036" got "3392c5afdd66fa54488a5a9f22320073f9aec036")
2020-04-24 04:10:16 ERROR : Users - 2017-01-17/duplicati-bfe7479148d834f33b37f2fb9b99c1276.dblock.zip.aes: Failed to copy: object corrupted on transfer - SHA1 mismatch (want "0D9BB2FCC87CBF2F2E2A99B58F270E7825946C40" got "0d9bb2fcc87cbf2f2e2a99b58f270e7825946c40")
2020-04-24 04:10:16 ERROR : Users - 2017-01-17/duplicati-bfe4ef968694f402ab8ca3a2bc32f86eb.dblock.zip.aes: Failed to copy: object corrupted on transfer - SHA1 mismatch (want "6DC40A535BF3A5CEE9AF57116A1FFEBB286BE736" got "6dc40a535bf3a5cee9af57116a1ffebb286be736")
2020-04-24 04:10:16 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 2 errors and: object corrupted on transfer - SHA1 mismatch (want "6DC40A535BF3A5CEE9AF57116A1FFEBB286BE736" got "6dc40a535bf3a5cee9af57116a1ffebb286be736")
2020-04-24 04:10:21 ERROR : Attempt 3/3 succeeded

#### Issue
rclone wants the SHA1 checksum in uppercase but gets it in lowercase.
All files are copied but for the bigger files (all just below 50 MB) I get this message.
